title: Hearts and Hands from Home Celebrates 10-Year Anniversary (Firelands Regional Medical Center)
text: ( Source : Firelands Regional Medical Center ) Hearts and Hands from Home (formerly Hats of Love ) has been spreading hope and warmth to patients at Firelands Regional Medical Center for 10 years . Hearts and Hands from Home is a volunteer
